info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 4:51PM EDT until April 06 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Davie County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Northeastern Alexander County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Northern Iredell County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 450 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Taylorsville, or near Love Valley, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Harmony, Love Valley, Hiddenite, Turnersburg, Olin, Sheffield, Union Grove and Stony Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
